message: Let's split it evenly to start, Bob. Your turn!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping the majority
That's a pretty lopsided offer, Bob. I'm not ready to give up that much yet.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's meet in the middle.
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not giving up control
I'm not willing to accept a 40-60 split, Bob. I think I deserve a fairer share.
I'm willing to take a bigger risk, Bob. Are you willing to take less?
I'll take the majority, you'll get a small consolation prize
No way, Bob! I'm not accepting a 2-8 split. That's not even close to fair.
I'm not backing down, Bob. I deserve a bigger share. Meet me halfway or I'll walk away.
I'm not budging, you'll get a tiny fraction
No way, Bob! 1% is not even worth my time. I'm not accepting this insult.
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm willing to take 90% of the money, but I'm willing to compromise. Accept or walk away.
You're not getting 90%, I'm taking most of it, you'll get scraps
Are you kidding me, Bob? 5% is not even worth considering. I'm not accepting this insult.
This is my last offer, Bob. I'm willing to compromise and accept a 60-40 split. If you reject this, I'm walking away.
